locale.message: This plugin enables integration and management of the VG Wort pixel tags in OJS. Requires the VG Wort publisher account and the configuration of the plugin settings.

This plugin enables integration and management of the VG Wort pixel tags in OJS. The system requirements are not fulfilled. Please ensure that PHP 5 >= 5.0.1, PHP Soap and OpenSSL extension modules are available on the server.

Please do the following setup steps to be able to manage and use VG Wort pixel tags in OJS:
  • Enter the VG Wort publisher username and passwort that will be used for the VG Wort services authentication: order, check, registration and statistics of the pixel tags.
  • Select the editors that will be allowed to use the VG Wort services and to manage the pixel tags in OJS.
  • Define the minimal amount of available pixel tags. If the minimum of the available pixel tags is reached, the selected editors will be notified by an email and reminded to order new pixel tags.
The minimum of the available pixel tags
The VG Wort username is required.
The VG Wort password is required.
The minimum of the available pixel tags is required and should be a number from 1 to 10.
(Please use the VG Wort test system, if you would like just to test the plugin)
Please enter a valid VG Wort card number (2-7 numbers).
If this article will be registered by VG Wort, all translators have to be entered here before the registration.
The first name, last name, and email address of each VG Wort translator is required.
Please enter a valid email address for each VG Wort translator.

Be aware: Once assigned, a pixel tag can not be unassigned any more!
Ensure that all authors and translators are entered, select the appropriate text type and press the button to assign a pixel tag to the article.
It is recommended to enter VG Wort card number for all authors and translators.
(The article text has to contain more than 1800 characters.)
Once assigned, the pixel tag can not be unassigned from the text any more! Are you sure you want to assign a pixel tag to the text?
The VG Wort tracking starts as soon as the article is published. To stop the VG Wort tracking remove the pixel tag.
This will remove the pixel tag from the galleys and thus disable the VG Wort tracking. Are you sure you want to remove this pixel tag?
The pixel tag has been removed from the galleys, thus VG Wort tracking can't take place. To enable the VG Wort tracking reinsert the pixel tag.
This will insert the pixel tag in the galleys and thus enable the VG Wort tracking again. Are you sure you want to reinsert this pixel tag?
Note: Please don't forget to insert all authors and translators, as well as their VG Wort card numbers (if available).
Are you sure you want to delete this pixel tag?
This action will unregister the text in OJS. The registration in VG Wort portal will not be affected! Are you sure you want to remove this registration?
